Scripts.OnLeave: NarciTooltip:HideTooltip(); if (self.isOn) or self:IsMouseOver(-4, 4, 0, 0) then return; end;

Scripts.OnLoad: self.isOn = false; self.tooltipDescription = Narci.L["Race Change Tooltip"];

Scripts.OnLeave: if not self.isOn then self.Highlight:Hide() end
if not self.isOn then self.Highlight:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.ShowSlider = false; self.tooltipDescription = Narci.L["Show Color Sliders"];
